short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text and give GPT generated summary, review quiz, or answer to custom question.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to more easily process text you read through the browser by allowing you to process selected text with chatgpt. There are one-click buttons for generating a summary or review quiz, or you can use a custom prompt.

You will have to insert your own openai api key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys to use.
